title: Giantbreaker
content:
im Hideout, Waukeen's Rest Quest: Find the Missing Shipment Merchant: Brem. He won't offer you this item by default, you must first help the Zhentarim during Find the Missing Shipment.

Giantbreaker Notes & Tips

Rarity: Rare Value: 480 Weight: 8.1 ID: 260a44f7-9ce6-4c8c-bcc8-2eb018c00590 Reeling: -1 penalty to Attack Rolls

Weapons Adamantine Longsword ♦ Adamantine Mace ♦ Adamantine Scimitar ♦ Air Myrmidon Flail ♦ Allandra's Whelm ♦ Ambusher ♦ Arcane Absorption Dagger ♦ Arduos Flame Blade ♦ Art
